        Whether the input MetricContext should be reported.

      • shouldReplaceByParent

        public boolean shouldReplaceByParent(InnerMetricContext removedMetricContext)
        Description copied from interface: ContextFilter
        This method is called by a ContextAwareReporter when a MetricContext that it used to report is cleaned. Every cleaned MetricContext is a leaf of the tree. In some circumstances, after removing the MetricContext it is necessary to start reporting the parent (for example, if we are reporting leaves, and the parent is a new leaf). This method is called to determine if the ContextAwareReporter should start reporting the parent of the input InnerMetricContext.
        Specified by:
        shouldReplaceByParent in interface ContextFilter
        Parameters:
        removedMetricContext - InnerMetricContext backing up the newly removed MetricContext.
        Returns:
        true if the parent of the removed MetricContext should be reported.
